mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select BNO, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where BNO = #{bno}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title =#{title}, content =#{content} where BNO=#{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno asc, regdate asc
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno>0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{page}, 10
select * from (select rownum rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from TBL_BOARD where bno>0 order by bno asc) where rn >= #{pageStart} and rn <= #{perPageNum}
